Welcome to sarge’s documentation!¶

Release:0.1.8.dev0
Date:Dec 13, 2023

Welcome to the documentation for sarge, a wrapper for subprocesswhich aims to make life easier for anyone who needs to interact with externalapplications from their Python code.

Please note: this documentation is work in progress.
